item.title: Assembler Basics for Instruction Sets
item.description: TEST POST LIBCCL: Relocatable to Absolute Machine Code The libccl compiler stores all information required to transform relocatable assembly to absolute assembly in the struct prco_op_struct. 1234567891011121314151617181920212223 struct prco_op_struct { // Encoded 16-bit instruction word // for printing to file unsigned short opcode; // Instruction parts // (opcode, register selects, immediates, etc.) unsigned char op; unsigned char regD : 3; unsigned char regA : 3; unsigned char imm8 : 8; signed char simm5 : 5; // Optional AST pointer to provide extra information // function, data type, etc.
